The map shows the transmission risk of coronavirus in different communities across Scotland.
A new interactive map of Scotland has revealed communities in the Highlands are among those facing the lo… [+3799 chars]

articles.title: Another coronavirus death confirmed at South Tyneside's main hospital trust - Shields Gazette
articles.description: Three more coronavirus cases have been confirmed across South Tyneside.
articles.content:
Public Health Englands figures on Thursday, May 21, show that the number of covid-19 infections across the borough has risen to 726.
